text:
e="preserve">Sir John Leslie Carrick (4 September 1918 – 18 May 2018) was an Australian politician. He was born in Sydney. Carrick served as a Senator for New South Wales from 1971 to 1987, representing the Liberal Party. He was a minister for the duration of the Fraser Government, holding several different portfolios.
Carrick died on 18 May 2018 at the age of 99 in Melbourne.
